name: LDLCholesterol
title: LDL Cholesterol
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Codes for LDL cholesterol in serum, plasma, or blood),(Data Element Scope: OBSERVATION:),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC codes for LDL cholesterol in serum, plasma, or blood, in mass/volume),(Exclusion Criteria: Discouraged or inactive codes or codes for LDL cholesterol in other body fluids, or in units other than mass/volume)
